metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5981 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[timing side-channel inside RSA-PSK key exchange]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-5981` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnutls-bin - 3.6.13-2ubuntu1.9
guile-gnutls - 3.6.13-2ubuntu1.9
libgnutls-dane0 - 3.6.13-2ubuntu1.9
libgnutls-openssl27 - 3.6.13-2ubuntu1.9
libgnutls30 - 3.6.13-2ubuntu1.9
libgnutlsxx28 - 3.6.13-2ubuntu1.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnutls28 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.13-2ubuntu1.9').
